Container.Name: homer
Container.Overview: A dead simple static HOMe for your servER to keep your services on hand from a simple yaml config.[br][br]Download config.yml[/br][/br]wget -O /mnt/user/appdata/homer/assets/config.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bastienwirtz/homer/master/config.yml
